name: Ninja Race Alpha 1
description:
Its a Game wich is really easy to Speedrun. Its a little bit like Happy wheels: You are a Ninja on a Bike and have to Race to the End Line, but Note that if u fall off the Bike you loose! So try not to land on your back and you can also fall off if u fall from too high and your Force Meter goes over 1000! It is a fun Game and you can spent your Time easily! 

Reviews are appreciated!
